zone.line: The following morning, urged by my affairs
Venice I left for five & twenty years
After this period I returned, & found
the name
Of Venice, and its aspect was the
same.
But Maddalo was travelling far away
of Armenia
Among the mountains tribes of India
His dog was dead. His child had now become
A woman, such as it has been my doom
To meet with few; a wonder of this Earth
Where there is little of uncommon worth
Like one of Shakespeare's women; kindly she
And with a manner beyond courtesy
Recieved her father's friend, & and I from her
when I asked
Of the poor maniac, she her memory tasked
And told as she had heard the mounful tale

line.del: That two years after I had

zone.line: That two years after I had to
That the poor sufferers health began fail
